name: centipede_damascus
text: I owe so many library fees it is insane.

name: bachamp
text: They want you to be overdue, the librarians works for satan.

name: invidious
text: Remember that time Todd was so overdue on his library books that the FBI, Mi-6, and Interpol were hunting him?

name: johnnyrocker
text:
I took out three books on Stonehenge once (long story,) and totally forgot about them.
A year later, I found them in my room!
"Uh oh," I thought, "I'd better get these back to the library... But I don't want to have to pay a fee!"

So I brought them to the library but didn't formally return them! I just tucked them under some Tom Clancy's!

Then, a week later, the librarians called my house and asked me if I had the Stonehenge books and said that there were no late fees on them anyways but if I didn't return them I would have to buy them.

And when I went back and checked under the Tom Clancy's, the Stonehenge books were gone!

So now I owe the library like $300 dollars and I've just been avoiding them all this time.

text: Col ou r

text:

Oh, Pat. Will you never learn?

name: i_love_kate
text:
Will people please make up their mind about which colour they more hate Ray being shown in? Grey or beige?

I might then also recommend to these people that do actually consider it at all relevant that they perhaps save the image and then photoshop it to their liking. Perhaps bring Ray out in a delightful mauve, or sapphire blue. These are just hypothetically what my suggestions would be. I would not do such a thing, as it would be crass and unwarrantedly scornful.

name: bjorntd
text:
Wait, isn't Phillipe also a stuffed animal?

I... I think I need to sit down.

name: rasalghul
text:
He is also a very naive 5-year-old otter. To fall for Lie Bot's lies is one thing, but he could be a little more cynical around Ray.

Or not.

name: edwell
text: The otter frets that the coke-addled, VD ridden, frequently dead squirrel might have overdue library books.

name: elzilcho
text: Remember that at this point, Todd is a lovable scamp

name: 7a65726f
text:
Panel two:

When a man holds a pink plush elephant afront his crotch, it's probably someone's birthday, at least in Phillipe's experience.

name: spaghetto
text: The alt-text makes this strip.

text: Heh. That is the same elephant that is the inspiration for the elephant costumes during the romance novel write-off/lash of thanatos' thing.
